short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qlip your websites to view them later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
pageQlip helps you use what you read. Add personalized alerts or reminders to review content you discover online at a later time or place to use your information when you want.

pageQlip saves and optimizes your content for the mobile experience in a clean, easy to read format. Your content is available to you online or offline on your iPhone or iPad, or via your account on our website.

With pageQlip location alerts, you can remind yourself about a certain article, recipe, review, restaurant, or product at locations you set and use.

Key Features:



Qlip - Articles, recipes, blogs..content you find online.
Use â€“ Add personal context with time and location alerts to remind you when and where you want to use your content. Easily read your articles when you are offline too.

Share - Share via Twitter or email.



Qlip online content with our browser extensions for Safari, Firefox, our browser friendly bookmarklet, or through e-mail and your registered account.
